name: Dark Transit-ZX Spectrum 48kb/128kb
description:
It is a year 2173 Humanity expands beyond the Solar system and discover how to travel interstellar with the most modern plasma engines now it's possible to reach the closest system in Proxima Centauri in "rellativly"short period still Humans can not survive for such a long travel,and because of that scientists designed special group of genetically modified cyborgs half organic human half machines we call them "Kappas"like Japanese folklore Monsters as they look like one of those when they wear huge mining suits but they are the only one's that can reach this new worlds.... Every Kappa have the double personallity one is the AI precise and rational and the other one is more "organic"emotional so it's kinda normal when you see Kappa that talking to himselves or having the double thoughts about the certain things sometimes that can even lead to the malfunctions or even unexpected deaths but still they will do their job's and more likely they will do it well..... Kappa's Jobs become mostly Interstellar mining procedures as the greedy Companies also expands beyond the solar system and those are the ones that invest the most in better engines,equipment and new modern Kappa's modifications but as always they expect the returns form their investments and if the Kappa fail once in his mission it will be most likely euthanized on his return..... Most recently few Companies lost the contact's with some mining post's,there are some rumors that possibly Alien UFO's attacked and destroy them however the International Space Service(ISS)still doub that something like that happends as we still officially never establish contact with the other civilazation and because of that ISS will put all the blame only on Kappa's malfunctions... Those far and unsafe regions in Proxima Centauri we call DARK TRANSIT and fewer and fewer Kappa's return from out there..... Kappa 33975 was doing his every day job on the mining rig in the relatively safe area on the Proxima 1a when he recived the SoS call from mining post 353 on Proxima 3b....Message was short and it says: "We are under attack"Kappa immediately informed the Company about that and recive returned message in a few days that said:"Kappa 33975 go and visit the site,investigate what happened and return back safe..end..." Kappa 33975 now it's your turn to visit the DARK TRANSIT...

*Game Manual*

-Dark Transit is ZX Spectrum 48kb/128kb game but you can easily play it on any platform(Win,Linux,Android,Mac) with some of the many ZX Spectrum Emulators 

-Controls: Q-UP(thrust)keep it pressed to fly around A-DOWN O-LEFT P-RIGHT M-JET PACK jump SPACE-USE 

-For higher Jump use:Side+Jet Pack jump+Up -Collect and use Items(Explosive,Mining Drills..etc)find a way to passthrough and stay alive!!! -After you use Item you can drop it to relase the space in your backpack -Have a Fun!!!

-Game Released in January 2021  Game made by:Sasa Bjedovic AkA/Goliat

-Visit our Youtube channel:Goliat eXperience

-Try and play DARK TRANSIT ONLINE

-For overall better eXperience listen this SOUNDTRACK while you playing Dark Transit

-Read detail game description in PLANETA SINCLAIR 

- TY for playing Dark Transit this was my first game for Speccy and now I am already working on much more sophisticated sequel that will come out very SOON and it's going to be also FREE 2 Play but If you want to help my gaming development  it will be very much appreciated with any amount that you can afford....

Author of the Game :GOLIAT
